cleaned_text: 1 Medical Policy Directory of Documents Policy Number: 411 Q: How do I comment on the documents? A: You can email us at ebr@bcbsma.com. Q: How do I find out which documents have changed? A: New and updated documents are posted to the system every week. To find out what has changed see the Provider Focus newsletter.
